hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #2# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 4 Bottom

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Claim Check#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs a #stable#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: Did you know that Dark Link's max health is equal to @'s max health?

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Bomb Bag#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Fire Temple Boss Key# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that Zelda's Lullaby can be used to repair broken signs.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #diving experiment# is rewarded with #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of #gold#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path of #gold#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #a Heart Container#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Carpenters' Boss House#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Lens of Truth# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #0# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Zora Tunic#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Slingshot# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle MQ Spirit Trial Sun Front Left Chest

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Zora Tunic#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Deku Stick#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Bomb Bag#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Left).text: Are you stuck? Try asking for help in our Discord server or check out our Wiki!

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Bomb Bag#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Forest Temple Compass#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Forest Temple Compass#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #Goron City#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Claim Check#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.
